15 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App

21  [Verb("session",
22  HelpText = "Run a complete session (tournament) between all thinkers")]
23  public class SessionOptions : GameOptions, ISessionConfig
24  {
25  // Points per win
26  private readonly int pointsPerWin;
27 
28  // Points per loss
29  private readonly int pointsPerLoss;
30 
31  // Points per draw
32  private readonly int pointsPerDraw;
33 
34  // Session configuration file
35  private readonly string configFile;
36 
37  // Session listeners
38  private readonly IEnumerable<string> sessionListeners;
39 
40  // A sequence of thinker prototypes
41  private IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> thinkerPrototypes;
42 
74  public SessionOptions(
75  int pointsPerWin, int pointsPerLoss, int pointsPerDraw,
76  string configFile,
77  IEnumerable<string> thinkerListeners,
78  IEnumerable<string> matchListeners,
79  IEnumerable<string> sessionListeners,
80  int rows, int cols, int winSequence,
81  int roundPiecesPerPlayer, int squarePiecesPerPlayer,
82  int timeLimitMillis, int minMoveTimeMillis,
83  IEnumerable<string> assemblies, bool debugMode)
84  : base(rows, cols, winSequence,
85  roundPiecesPerPlayer, squarePiecesPerPlayer,
86  timeLimitMillis, minMoveTimeMillis,
87  thinkerListeners, matchListeners,
88  assemblies, debugMode)
89  {
90  this.pointsPerWin = pointsPerWin;
91  this.pointsPerLoss = pointsPerLoss;
92  this.pointsPerDraw = pointsPerDraw;
93  this.configFile = configFile;
94  this.sessionListeners = sessionListeners;
95  }

100  [Option("points-per-win", Default = 3, HelpText = "Points per win")]
101  public int PointsPerWin => pointsPerWin;
102 
106  [Option("points-per-loss", Default = 0, HelpText = "Points per loss")]
107  public int PointsPerLoss => pointsPerLoss;
108 
112  [Option("points-per-draw", Default = 1, HelpText = "Points per draw")]
113  public int PointsPerDraw => pointsPerDraw;
114 
122  [Option('g', "config", Required = true,
123  HelpText = "Session configuration file, each line contains fully "
124  + "qualified name of thinker, space, thinker options")]
125  public string ConfigFile => configFile;
126 
130  [Option("thinker-listeners",
131  Default = new string[] { },
132  HelpText = "Thinker event listeners (space separated)")]
133  public override IEnumerable<string> ThinkerListeners =>
134  base.ThinkerListeners;
135 
139  [Option("match-listeners",
140  Default = new string[] { },

142  public override IEnumerable<string> MatchListeners =>
143  base.MatchListeners;
144 
148  [Option("session-listeners",
149  Default = new string[] {
150  "ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App.SimpleRenderingListener" },
151  HelpText = "Session event listeners (space separated)")]
152  public IEnumerable<string> SessionListeners => sessionListeners;
153 
157  public override IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> ThinkerPrototypes
158  {
159  get
160  {
161  // Thinker prototypes are lazily instantiated
162  if (thinkerPrototypes == null)
163  {
164  // Collection of thinker prototypes
165  ICollection<IThinkerPrototype> prototypes =
166  new List<IThinkerPrototype>();
167 
168  // Open file listing the thinkers and their configurations
169  using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(configFile))
170  {
171  // Each line specifies a thinker and its configuration
172  char[] seps = { ' ' };
173  string line;
174 
175  // Loop through all the lines
176  while ((line = sr.ReadLine()) != null)
177  {
178  // Trim line
179  line = line.Trim();
180 
181  // Only process line if it's not empty or is
182  // commented out
183  if (line.Length > 0 && line[0] != '#'
184  && line[0] != '%' && line[0] != ';')
185  {
186  // Split the line in two using the first space
187  string[] parsed = line.Split(seps, 2);
188 
189  // Get the thinker fully qualified name
190  string thinkerFQN =
191  parsed.Length > 0 ? parsed[0] : "";
192 
193  // Get the thinker parameters
194  string thinkerParams =
195  parsed.Length > 1 ? parsed[1] : "";
196 
197  // Add prototype to collection
198  prototypes.Add(
199  new ThinkerPrototype(
200  thinkerFQN, thinkerParams, this));
201  }
202  }
203  }
204  // Place collection in instance variable
205  thinkerPrototypes = prototypes;
206  }
207 
208  // Return the thinker prototypes
209  return thinkerPrototypes;
210  }
211  }
212  }
213 }
